summary: The Nationwide Consumer and Fuel Retailer Choice Act of 2025 amends the Clean Air Act concerning ethanol waivers and Reid Vapor Pressure (RVP) limitations. It modifies existing RVP regulations and addresses credit generation for small refineries within the renewable fuel program, specifically for 2016-2018 compliance years. The bill aims to relax restrictions on fuel blends containing ethanol, potentially impacting consumer choices and fuel retailers.
